column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Common Bond isn't bad but definitely not outstanding food and not worth the money spent.  You have a decent wait in line
column3: dining is cramped and you can't eat without someone bumping you.  We came for lunch and ordered the burger
column6: and fried chicken burger with a coffee.  The burger was dry and light on flavor
column7: the fried chicken burger was oily and not very crunchy
column9: and the quiche with salad was okay.  Our coffees were extremely sweet so we didn't even drink them.  We didn't mention it to the staff because a part of our order was wrong and all they could say was oops and sorry.  This isn't service in any way.  Needless to say
